reset_unsuccessful_message: There was a problem resetting the settings.
reset_to_defaults_message: Do you want to reset all the settings to their defaults?
select_all_records_message: You have selected all the {allRecords} records that meet your criteria
select_all_message: Select all {allRecords} records or just the {currentRecords} records shown? (Warning select all limit = 5000)
nothing_to_import_message: Please select at least one column to import.
invites_sent: Invites have been sent to bookings
confirm_removal: Do you really want to remove the selected item(s)?
confirm_import_message: We will import your records in chunks, please don't close this window until its complete
import_successful_message: The data has schedule for importation.
import_unsuccessful: Import failed, please check the data
contact_added_message: The contact has successfully been added.
confirm_archive: Do your really want to delete the selected item(s)?
delete_permanently: Do you really want to delete the selected item(s)?
confirm_restore: Do you really want to restore the selected item(s)?
confirm_restore_many: This will restore the items into the main list.
confirm_force_delete: Do you really want to delete the selected item(s)?
confirm_force_delete_many: All selected items will be permanently deleted. You will not be able to restore them in future.
deleting_records_confirmation_message: You are about to permanently delete all the selected records! This cannot be undone
archiving_contacts_confirmation_message: You are about to delete all selected records!
restoring_records_confirmation_message: You are about to restore selected records!
archiving_records_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected records?
contacts_confirmation_existing: Which contacts would you like to add to the address book?
contacts_confirmation_dont_exist: Only contacts that are not in the address book yet.
archiving_rsvps_confirmation_message: Do you really want to delete this guests? Please note that guests of guest are also deleted if they are attached.
deleting_rsvps_confirmation_message: Do you really want to permanently delete this guests? Please note that guests of guest are also deleted if they are attached. This cannot be undone!
